title: Ultraviolette Automotive starts exports of e-motorcycle to EU markets
description: Ultraviolette Automotive has started exporting its F77 Mach 2 electric motorcycles to the European Union. The flag-off ceremony in Bengaluru was attended by Union Minister H D Kumaraswamy and Karnataka Minister M B Patil. This move is seen as a significant step in positioning India as a global player in the EV industry.
